event ItemCreated(uint256 indexed itemId, address indexed nftContract, uint256 indexed tokenId, address seller, address owner, uint256 price, uint256 distributionPrice, bool sold)
event OwnerAdded(address owner, uint256 tokenId, address[] owners)
function createItem(address nftContract, uint256 tokenId, uint256 distributionPrice, uint256 price) payable
function sellItem(address nftContract, uint256 itemId) payable
function sellNFT(address nftContract, uint256 tokenId) payable
